prompt: This is a website [{{url}}], and this is the content I extracted from the website: [{{content}}].. Can you determine which category this website belongs to based on the content? I would like the result in JSON format as follows: 'website': 'url', 'category': 'category_name'. Please choose a category from the list provided below for accurate classification: (Technology, Startup, Sales, Health, Business, Education, Finance, Web3, Human Resource, Generative AI, Others, Economy, Gen AI, HR, Law, Management, Productivity, Sales & Marketing, Stocks, Tech, VC & PE, Entertainment, Adult). You can select multiple categories if you are familiar with the website. You may also disregard the extracted data if necessary. IMPORTANT: While showing the result, only show the json result.
